title: Client Buggy/slow
body:
I updated the League client this morning, with the msi update, and its buggy as hell. It takes ages for champ select to load up once I accept a match, I couldnt change my runes/masteries, and once the game loaded up I was stuck on the loading screen, but I could hear the sounds of the game. Does anyone else have this issue?
 {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}}

replies.body: It happens sometimes to me too, when i finish a game the client goes through 2 loading screens, aswell as the defeat screen being wayy longer and buggier then the old client

Sounds like a bad patch to me. Run through the steps [HERE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to set up your permissions then repair your client. If repairing doesn't fix the issue then reinstall.

UPDATE: I was trying to load back into the game ( I could hear everything but I just got a black screen) My team surrendered, most likely because they didnt have a support, and I got leave busted and placed on a priority que for the next five games. Thanks Riot...
